 2013-07832013-06-06,  ,  PMO,  , 
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE ROBERT J. BAUMAN to be Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, with the style and title of Chief Justice of British Columbia, and Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal of Yukon during his tenure of office as Chief Justice of British Columbia.
